name: Dreamscaper (itch) (Husfar)
description:
Late submission for Metroidvania Jam Month 7.

A mind bending dreamy gravity adventure through anger and calmness.

Movement: WASD or arrow keys.
Kick: left-alt
Bounce (after acquiring power up): hold shift

Credits:
Brainsteel: programming
Chrispy: design
Redevil: design 
MasterDan: art
Husfar: sound
